alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Northern Washington; Southeast Warren; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 11:19AM EST until February 23 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The southern Adirondacks, Lake George Saratoga Region, Washington County and southern Vermont. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 1 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will overspread the area late this afternoon through early this evening. Snowfall rates of up to an inch per hour are expected this evening, with several inches of snow accumluating before the snow mixes with and changes to sleet and freezing late tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
